sub_title: Executive Search Services Coordinator (Talent Acquisition) at Philips
summary:
I am an experienced Project Manager/ Coordinator with a demonstrated history of working in the market research industry. Skilled in project and time management with excellent communication skills. You will find in me a strong support professional with a Master of Arts (MA) degree.

After years in market research, I found my way to Human Resources (HR), where I could also show and exploit my project coordination skills. 

I love to work hard but am always in for a laugh with colleagues. Teamwork is key!

projects.title: Eurobarometer - European Commisson
projects.description: Flash Eurobarometers are ad hoc thematical telephone interviews conducted at the request of any service of the European Commission. Flash surveys enable the Commission to obtain results relatively quickly and to focus on specific target groups, as and when required.(European Commission)

contributors.headline: Executive Search Services Coordinator (Talent Acquisition) at Philips

projects.title: PIAAC - Onderzoek zoek naar kennis en vaardigheden
projects.description:
Deelnemen aan de arbeidsmarkt en volwaardig participeren in het dagelijks leven vragen om voldoende kennis en vaardigheden. Ontwikkelingen zoals globalisering, flexibilisering van de arbeidsmarkt en de steeds grotere rol van ict vereisen meer en andere vaardigheden van mensen.

Om het niveau van kennis en vaardigheden in kaart te brengen, neemt Nederland deel aan PIAAC (Programme for the international Assessment of Adult Compentencies): een grootschalig internationaal onderzoek dat het niveau en het gebruik van vaardigheden onder 16-65-jarigen in kaart brengt. Het onderzoek is onder leiding van de OECD uitgevoerd in 24 landen en meet het niveau van taalvaardigheid, rekenvaardigheid en probleemoplossend vermogen van volwassenen. Deze vaardigheden noemen we kernvaardigheden omdat het essentiële vaardigheden zijn voor het begrijpen, analyseren en gebruiken van informatie die we in het dagelijks leven en op het werk tegenkomen. (piaac.nl)

contributors.headline: Executive Search Services Coordinator (Talent Acquisition) at Philips

projects.title: SHARE - Survey of Health, Ageing, and Retirement in Europ
projects.description:
SHARE beschrijft in detail de leefsituatie van 50-plussers in Europa vóór en na hun pensionering. De informatie wordt gebruikt t.b.v. advies voor de verbetering van de leefsituatie van ouderen. Vragen die o.a. beantwoord kunnen worden zijn:
Wat zijn de belangrijkste ontwikkelingen in de gezondheid en sociaal-economische situatie van de 50-plussers in Europa?
In hoeverre wordt in de behoeften aan gezondheidszorg en financiële ondersteuning voorzien naarmate men ouder wordt?
Hoe zullen mogelijke hervormingen in de gezondheidszorg de leefsituatie van 50-plussers beïnvloeden? (share-project.nl)

contributors.headline: Executive Search Services Coordinator (Talent Acquisition) at Philips

profile_positions.description:
Supporting the Amsterdam-based Executive Search Services (ESS) team and the business throughout the interview and hiring process with a different range of responsibilities:
Scheduling interviews, liaising with hiring managers and interview panel, offer management, data quality management, compliance related activities, managing interview schedules, maintaining files and systems, providing assistance to external candidates/internal applicants.
profile_positions.title: Executive Search Services Coordinator (Talent Acquisition/HR)

profile_positions.description: The Delivery Manager's role is to provide operational leadership and quality management for qualitative research projects. This means working closely with key stakeholders in customer-facing teams and with internal stakeholders. A Delivery Manager also works together with external partners. In this role, I provided advice and guidance on a project, ensuring a good planning and budget, with the aim of delivering a project that meets the required requirements and quality.
profile_positions.title: Delivery manager (Qualitative research)

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating qualitative B2C and B2B market research projects: including a.o. focus groups, individual interviews, creative workshops and online platforms. 
Supporting qualitative reasearchers with project management in different countries. 
Constantly switching between different projects and various schedules. 
Responsible for executing the studies within the planned time and budget. 
Point of contact for external clients, suppliers, freelancers and sister companies abroad. 
Training training colleagues 
Working for a diverse range of leading profit and non-profit clients.

KANTAR is one of the largest research agencies worldwide, providing powerful insights through a variety of research methodologies. It is one of the world’s leading data, insight and consultancy companies.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Qualitative Services

profile_positions.description:
Triple C stands for Connected Call Centers and is a system for several countries. CATI research (telephone fieldwork) The advantage is that all call centers are purchased on a system and can be monitored from a location. 38 countries around the world have now been connected to this system. Men can perform field work quickly and efficiently in this way, resulting in a fast data delivery.

▪ Setting up surveys on a central system: loading questionnaires and samples
▪ Main point of contact for all technical problems concerning the Triple C system
▪ Communication between Project Management team in Brussels, Sampling team in London, support
team of Dialer hardware and software in London
• Main point of contact for all countries connected to the Triple C system and for new countries that
want to join
• Organize maintenance windows and monitor progress
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
For face-to-face research, the work is done via the CAPI (Computer Assisted Personal Interview) method. Here, the interviewer asks the respondent to participate in the research. With the CAPI method, the interviewer asks the questions with answer options and the respondent indicates the answer of his choice.

Here my responsibility lay with supervising and setting up fieldwork for face-to-face interviewers. In consultation with the research project leader, a plan was made for the fieldwork. Based on that and where the investigation was to take place, I called in interviewers. If this was desired, instructions were planned and also given by myself. During the entire fieldwork period, I monitored the progress of the investigation and guided and supported interviewers in the field. I was also the first point of contact for interviewers with all kinds of questions about the project. Declarations were also checked by the interviewers.

In brief:
- communication about preliminary process fieldwork with possible customer or project manager
- planning, managing and supervising face-to-face interviewers
- supervise and coordinate investigations
- make and give instructions to interviewers
- manage project progress
- handling administrative duties regarding interviewers
- monitoring deadlines
- checking declarations
profile_positions.title: Fieldwork Executive - Face-to-face (CAPI)
